content.html: The best way I've found to talk about tech debt respectfully is to just say "smart people in a hurry made this" It's there because it solved a problem. It may be some of the most thoughtful, delicate engineering work you have. Don't insult it!
content.value:
The best way I've found to talk about tech debt respectfully is to just say "smart people in a hurry made this"

It's there because it solved a problem. It may be some of the most thoughtful, delicate engineering work you have. Don't insult it!
